LanguageData.TropicalRainforest.label: 热带雨林
LanguageData.TropicalRainforest.description: 茂密潮湿的丛林。尽管如此美丽多姿，却实际上是个非常危险的生态区。繁茂到闭塞的植被，富有攻击性的动物，以及阴魂不散的疾病，这就是为什么有些探险者将之称为「绿色地狱」。
LanguageData.TropicalSwamp.label: tropical swamp
LanguageData.TropicalSwamp.description: A thick jungle with lots of marsh and mud. Difficult movement, little space to build heavy structures, aggresive animals, and constant diseases make living here a nightmare.
